short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select elements and store their XPaths

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a powerful tool designed for testers and developers. With this extension, you can effortlessly select elements on any webpage and automatically generate their XPath. Once the XPaths are selected, simply click the "Get XPaths" button to send them directly to the TestQ tool for seamless integration into your testing workflow. This extension streamlines the process of identifying and transferring XPaths, enhancing efficiency and accuracy in your testing efforts.
